properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) BOARD_COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , BOARD_TITLE , USER_ID , COUNT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE" FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (BOARD_WRITER = USER_NO) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
